(as of Nov 30,2022 04:24:02 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Why Choose OurWarm Snowman Porch Light Covers?

Perfect Size: OurWarm Christmas snowman porch light covers are approximately 12.2×10.2×6 inches, which can fit over most porch lights and garage lights.Premium Light Transmitting Material: The holiday porch light covers are made of high-quality EVA textured plastic which has good light transmission. Sparkling light adds holiday cheer to your home’s exterior, both day and night.Classic Design: OurWarm Christmas porch light cover is designed with a cute smiley snowman, black hat, red nose, and blush cheeks. Perfect for decorating your outdoor porch light, your garage door lights, or even your lamp post for home decorations!Professional Brand: OurWarm Specialize in Providing Perfect Service for parties, such as Wedding, Home parties, Halloween, Christmas, Graduation, Fall, and Thanksgiving.

Features

1. Greet family and friends with a glowing welcome from this cute snowman.

2. Protect the bulb from being damaged or covered and gather the light for a better view. Perfect decorations for your home, workspaces, family gatherings, banquets, etc.

Specifications Color: As shown Material: High-quality EVA textured plastic Size：12.2×10.2×6 inches Package Including: 2 packs + extra elastic strap Package: Kraft paper box

Premium Material

The outdoor snowman decoration is made of high-quality EVA textured plastic with a crystallized texture that looks like snow.

Easy for installation

Each snowman light cover is equipped with elastic straps for better flexibility and a 30% increase in service life. Just Loop the strap over your outdoor porch light.

Unique Design

The cute smiley snowman light cover has a red nose and blush cheek with a black hat, matched with classic red fruits and holly leaves elements to enhance the festive atmosphere.

【Christmas Porch Light Covers】 Snowman porch light cover measures 12.2×10.2×6 inches, which can fit over most porch lights and garage lights. You can decorate the porch by Installing these two light covers to make your porch lights out of tedious and create a welcoming entry for garages, patios, and other entryways. Merry Christmas!
【Eye-catching Snowman Light Covers Set】 OurWarm Christmas porch light cover is designed with a cute smiley snowman, black hat, red nose and blush cheeks, match with classic red fruits and holly leaves elements to enhance the festive atmosphere, adds a touch of warmth to us in cold winter. Perfect for any Christmas theme decoration.
【Premium Light Transmitting Material】 The outdoor snowman decoration is made of high-quality EVA textured plastic with a crystallized texture that looks like snow. Also, the holiday porch light covers have good light transmission. Sparkling light adds holiday cheer to your home’s exterior, both day and night. The waterproof material makes it work perfectly in most weather.
【Easy Installation】 Each snowman light cover is equipped with elastic straps for better flexibility and a 30% increase in service life. Just Loop the strap over your outdoor porch light, your garage door lights, or even your lamp post, and you needn’t worry about the lamp cover falling anymore. When not in use, you can put it away and use it the next winter
【Multiple Applications】 These holiday porch light covers go right over your existing fixtures to give any light a festive touch. You can also give it as a gift to your family and friends. The best ideal Christmas gift. (OurWarm is a professional seller of Christmas decorations, so if you have any questions, please feel free to contact us, we will provide you with 100% satisfactory service)
